Bridging Education,Research, Policy & Practice

Evidence-driven solutions for climate resilience, sustainable development, and international education.

I‚Äôm Bishwa Prakash Puri, an interdisciplinary researcher and consultant working at the intersection of environmental science, data analytics, and education strategy. As an Assistant Professor, Environmental Consultant, and certified Study Abroad Advisor, I help institutions, governments, NGOs, and students turn complex challenges into practical, measurable outcomes.

‚Üí Explore Research ‚Üí Study Abroad ‚Üí Start a Conversation

Who I Am

I combine academic rigor with hands-on field experience to deliver work that is technically sound, ethically grounded, and designed for real impact. Whether modeling watershed systems, implementing Environmental Impact Assessments, or mentoring students applying to global universities, my approach stays consistent: clarity, evidence, and action.

‚ö° Core Expertise

My work integrates scientific research, geospatial analysis, and strategic advisory support for diverse institutions.

Technical & Analytical

Hydrologic Modeling (SWAT, HEC-HMS) Climate Change Impact Assessment GIS & Remote Sensing (ArcGIS, QGIS) Statistical Analysis (Python, R) Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA/IEE)

Strategic & Academic

Policy Analysis & Adaptation Planning Academic Program Design International Education Pathways Proposal & Grant Development

Services

I collaborate with government agencies, NGOs, universities, and private-sector partners on research, consulting, and capacity-building initiatives.

Environmental & Climate Consulting

EIA/IEE preparation, hydropower assessments, multi-hazard vulnerability analysis, monitoring frameworks, and environmental compliance audits.

Research & Data Analysis

Hydrologic modeling, climate-agriculture studies, water resource assessments, spatial data workflows, literature reviews, and academic writing.

International Education Advisory

University selection, application strategy, scholarship guidance, SOP coaching, and visa preparation for USA, UK, and Australia.

Capacity Building & Training

Training programs on GIS, climate analysis, Python/R analytics, research methods, proposal writing, and M&E frameworks.

Grant Writing & Proposal Development

End-to-end support for competitive grants‚Äîconcept notes, ToC development, budgeting, and stakeholder engagement.

Geospatial Data Solutions

Climate downscaling, cartography, land use mapping, decision-support tools, and custom spatial analysis pipelines.
